pullRequest.title: Fix #5880
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #5880
Changes proposed in this pull request:
I finally found the root cause of these issues with some help from @Raycoms
This PR tweaks inventory handling in addition to removing the old one-stack crafting limitation that was causing #5880 to happen.
Review please

nodes.bodyText: We used to have it to avoid subrequests < 64 items. We removed the limitations in other places but not here which caused some weird bugs. @OrionDevelopment
